\usepackage{cmacros}

\begin{document}
\begin{aproblems}
Find the eigenvalues of
\[
A= \begin{bmatrix} -13 & 6 \\ -9 & 8 \end{bmatrix}
\]
For each eigenvalue, find a corresponding eigenvector.
\end{aproblems}
\end{document}
